about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle: A neighborhood tradition since 2008
about.story: What started as a small family kitchen has grown into your neighborhood gathering place. We're proud to serve generous portions of homestyle cooking made with fresh, quality ingredients. Whether you're stopping by for a quick lunch, bringing the family for dinner, or grabbing takeout on your way home, we treat everyone like family.

options.description: Order ahead and pick up at our takeout counter
Let us cater your next event
options.note: Order at least 48 hours in advance
